meaning: 8 AM person / Early riser / Student having 8am class
description: Refers to university students with 8 AM classes or office workers starting early.

examples.chinese: 早八人,有一说一,每天都好困
examples.translation: 8 AM person, to be honest, sleepy every day

examples.chinese: 半学期没上课的人最后几周做早八人
examples.translation: People with no classes half the semester become 8 AM people in the last weeks

examples.chinese: 早八人？我满课人的一天,从早八到晚九
examples.translation: 8 AM person? I have full classes, from 8am to 9pm

examples.chinese: 五分钟完成出门妆,很适合早八人
